lyrics:
11 contributorstogether lyricsverse 1 demi lovato
remember love
remember you and me
remember everything we shared on this planet when we cared
remember hearts
remember unity
remember loving neighbors without expecting favors

prechorus 1 demi lovato
why be afraid to make an honest mistake
if you acknowledge the pain
and you wanna change
you can get through anything

chorus demi lovato
do you remember at all
people walking handinhand
can we feel that love again
can you imagine it all
if we all could get along
then we all could sing this song together

postchorus demi lovato
ohohohohoh
ohohohohohohoh
singing ohohohohoh
ohohohohohohoh
you might also likeverse 2 jason derulo
look at me
now look at you
now look at me again
see were not so different
look around what do you see
were throwing things outside our window
we dont care to keep it clean

prechorus 2 jason derulo
i had a dream beauty was only skin deep
and if we all just believe
love is all we need
nothing else can set you free yeah

chorus demi lovato  jason derulo
do you remember at all
people walking handinhand
can we feel that love again
can you imagine it all
if we all could get along
then we all could sing this song together

postchorus demi lovato
ohohohohoh oh yeah
ohohohohohohoh aye
singing oh ohohohohoh
ohoh ohwhoaoh
ohohohohohohoh ooh yeah
bridge demi lovato  jason derulo
if we could throw away the hate
and make love last another day
dont give up just for today
life would be so simple
and they may talk about us
but they will never stop us
well keep singing

breakdown demi lovato  jason derulo
ohohohohoh woo
ohohohohohohoh
come on well keep singing
singing ohohohohohoh
whoayeah whoayeah
ohohohohohohoh

chorus demi lovato  jason derulo
do you remember at all
people walking handinhand
can we feel that love again
can you imagine it all
if we all could get along
then we all could sing this song together

postchorus demi lovato
ohohohohoh
ohohohohohohoh
singing ohohohohoh
ohohohohohohoh
outro demi lovato  jason derulo
oh come on come on come on
come on come on come on come on yeah
hold your hand with your neighbors
together together
no da dadada
oh yeah oh
come and sing it with
looking at you baby
oh ohoh2embed
